Name: A Poor Day's work
Description: Even giants falter, and you are certainly no giant. Today's work is poor and riddled with mistakes. Perhaps tomorrow will bring better results.

Name: A Good Day's Work
Description: A good day brings good spirits. Your hands strike true and your mind remains clear. You accomplish the task on hand, no lesser or greater.

Name: A Great Day's Work
Description: By a stroke of luck, the work tires less today. You work hard and your boss notices. This bodes well for the future.
